title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer
description: Join our research team building next-generation AI systems. You'll develop novel ML architectures, work on large language models, and deploy models at massive scale serving billions of users. Collaborate with world-class researchers and engineers to push the boundaries of what's possible with AI.
requirements: Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, Deep Learning, Neural Networks, NLP, Computer Vision, Distributed Training, Model Optimization, Research experience, 5+ years ML engineering
education_required: Master's or PhD in Computer Science, Machine Learning, or related field
projects_required: Published research papers, open-source contributions, or production ML systems at scale

title: ML Engineer
description: Build recommendation systems that power Facebook, Instagram, and WhatsApp. Work on personalization algorithms, ranking models, and content understanding using state-of-the-art ML techniques. Your work will impact billions of users daily.
requirements: Python, PyTorch or TensorFlow, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Recommendation Systems, A/B Testing, SQL, Spark, 3+ years experience building production ML systems
education_required: Bachelor's or Master's in Computer Science or related field
projects_required: Experience with large-scale ML systems, preferably in recommendations or ranking

title: Junior Machine Learning Engineer
description: Join our personalization team to improve music and podcast recommendations. Learn from senior ML engineers while contributing to real production systems. Work on audio analysis, natural language processing, and collaborative filtering.
requirements: Python, Machine Learning fundamentals, TensorFlow or PyTorch, SQL, Basic NLP, 1-2 years of experience or strong internship background
education_required: Bachelor's in Computer Science, Statistics, or related field
projects_required: Academic projects or personal ML projects demonstrating hands-on experience

title: Staff Machine Learning Engineer
description: Lead the development of large language models and multimodal AI systems. Define technical strategy, mentor engineers, and work on cutting-edge research. You'll have significant impact on products used by millions including ChatGPT and DALL-E.
requirements: Python, PyTorch, Transformers, Large Language Models, Distributed Training (multi-GPU/multi-node), Model Architecture Design, Research background, 8+ years ML engineering with 3+ years in leadership
education_required: PhD in Computer Science, Machine Learning, or equivalent experience
projects_required: Track record of major contributions to ML systems, published papers at top conferences (NeurIPS, ICML, ICLR)

title: Applied ML Scientist
description: Work on Alexa's natural language understanding and speech recognition. Develop and deploy ML models for voice interfaces, work with massive datasets, and optimize models for edge devices. Balance cutting-edge research with practical product requirements.
requirements: Python, Deep Learning, NLP, Speech Recognition, PyTorch or TensorFlow, AWS, Model Compression, MLOps, 4+ years experience in applied ML
education_required: Master's or PhD in Machine Learning, Computer Science, or related field
projects_required: Experience deploying ML models to production, preferably in NLP or speech

title: Computer Vision Engineer
description: Develop neural networks for autonomous driving perception. Work on object detection, tracking, and scene understanding using camera and sensor fusion. Your code will run on millions of Tesla vehicles worldwide.
requirements: Python, Computer Vision, Deep Learning, PyTorch, OpenCV, Object Detection, Semantic Segmentation, Real-time systems, C++, 3+ years CV experience
education_required: Bachelor's or Master's in Computer Science, Robotics, or related field
projects_required: Portfolio demonstrating computer vision expertise, preferably in autonomous systems

title: MLOps Engineer
description: Build infrastructure and tools for ML model deployment at Netflix scale. Create pipelines for training, evaluation, and serving models. Work with data scientists and ML engineers to streamline the path from research to production.
requirements: Python, Kubernetes, Docker, AWS, ML frameworks (TensorFlow/PyTorch), CI/CD, Monitoring tools, Feature stores, 4+ years MLOps or DevOps experience
education_required: Bachelor's in Computer Science or related field
projects_required: Experience building ML infrastructure and deployment pipelines

title: Research Scientist - AI
description: Conduct fundamental research in machine learning and AI. Publish at top-tier conferences, collaborate with academia, and transition research into Microsoft products. Focus areas include reinforcement learning, multimodal learning, and AI safety.
requirements: PhD in Machine Learning or Computer Science, Strong publication record (NeurIPS, ICML, CVPR), PyTorch or TensorFlow, Research experience in AI, Strong mathematical background
education_required: PhD in Machine Learning, Computer Science, Statistics, or related field
projects_required: Published papers at top ML conferences, preferably as first author

title: NLP Engineer
description: Build NLP models for grammar checking, style suggestions, and tone detection. Work with transformers, fine-tune large language models, and optimize for real-time performance. Improve writing for 30+ million daily users.
requirements: Python, NLP, Transformers, BERT, GPT, spaCy, Fine-tuning, Model serving, 3+ years NLP experience
education_required: Bachelor's or Master's in Computer Science, Computational Linguistics, or related field
projects_required: NLP projects or products, experience with language models

title: Machine Learning Intern
description: 12-week summer internship working on Siri's ML infrastructure. Contribute to real projects in natural language understanding, speech recognition, or on-device ML. Mentorship from senior engineers and opportunity for full-time conversion.
requirements: Python, Machine Learning coursework, PyTorch or TensorFlow, Strong CS fundamentals, Currently pursuing Bachelor's or Master's in CS/ML
education_required: Currently enrolled in Bachelor's or Master's program in Computer Science or related field
projects_required: Academic ML projects, Kaggle competitions, or personal projects

title: Senior Software Engineer - Backend
description: Build scalable payment infrastructure processing billions of dollars. Design APIs, work on distributed systems, and ensure 99.99% uptime. Work with Ruby, Go, and modern cloud infrastructure.
requirements: Ruby, Go or Java, Distributed Systems, PostgreSQL, Redis, API Design, Microservices, 5+ years backend development
education_required: Bachelor's in Computer Science or equivalent experience
projects_required: Experience building high-scale distributed systems

title: Software Engineer II
description: Work on Azure cloud services. Build features for compute, storage, or networking. Write C# and Go, deploy at massive scale, and collaborate across teams.
requirements: C# or Java, Go, Azure or AWS, Kubernetes, Docker, REST APIs, 3+ years software development
education_required: Bachelor's in Computer Science or related field
projects_required: Experience with cloud platforms and scalable services

title: Junior Software Engineer
description: Join our platform team building tools for thousands of engineers. Learn from senior engineers, contribute to open-source projects, and work on real production systems serving millions.
requirements: Java or Python, React or similar framework, SQL, Git, Strong CS fundamentals, 0-2 years experience
education_required: Bachelor's in Computer Science or related field
projects_required: Personal projects, internships, or open-source contributions

title: Principal Engineer
description: Lead architecture for Uber's marketplace platform. Define technical strategy, mentor staff engineers, and drive cross-org initiatives. Solve problems at billion-user scale.
requirements: Deep expertise in distributed systems, 12+ years software engineering, Go/Java/Python, System design mastery, Leadership experience, Track record of technical impact
education_required: Bachelor's or higher in Computer Science, or equivalent experience
projects_required: Led major technical initiatives with company-wide impact

title: Backend Engineer - Payments
description: Build payment processing systems for millions of merchants. Work on fraud detection, transaction processing, and financial infrastructure. High reliability and security critical.
requirements: Ruby, Java, or Go, PostgreSQL, Redis, Payment systems knowledge, 4+ years backend development, Strong testing practices
education_required: Bachelor's in Computer Science or related field
projects_required: Experience with financial or payment systems preferred

title: Staff Software Engineer - Infrastructure
description: Lead infrastructure initiatives serving Lyft's entire engineering org. Build developer tools, CI/CD pipelines, and cloud infrastructure. Mentor engineers and drive technical excellence.
requirements: Go or Python, Kubernetes, AWS, Terraform, Infrastructure as Code, Monitoring, 8+ years experience with 3+ in infrastructure/platform
education_required: Bachelor's in Computer Science or equivalent experience
projects_required: Led infrastructure projects impacting hundreds of engineers

title: Software Engineer - Mobile
description: Build Instagram's iOS and Android apps used by over 2 billion people. Work on performance, new features, and user experience. Collaborate with designers and product managers.
requirements: Swift or Kotlin, iOS or Android development, React Native, Mobile architecture, 3+ years mobile development
education_required: Bachelor's in Computer Science or related field
projects_required: Published mobile apps or significant contributions to mobile projects

title: Senior Frontend Engineer
description: Build Figma's collaborative design tool using WebGL and React. Work on real-time collaboration, performance optimization, and user experience. Push the boundaries of what's possible in the browser.
requirements: JavaScript/TypeScript, React, WebGL or Canvas, Performance optimization, Real-time systems, 5+ years frontend development
education_required: Bachelor's in Computer Science or equivalent experience
projects_required: Portfolio of complex web applications, preferably with real-time features

title: Software Development Engineer
description: Work on AWS services like EC2, S3, or Lambda. Build features used by millions of customers worldwide. Own services from design to deployment.

education_required: Bachelor's in Computer Science or related field
projects_required: Experience with cloud services or distributed systems

title: Senior Data Scientist
description: Drive product decisions with data. Build models for user engagement, conduct A/B tests, and work with product teams. Influence how millions discover music.
requirements: Python, R, SQL, Machine Learning, Statistical Analysis, A/B Testing, Data Visualization, Causal Inference, 5+ years data science experience
education_required: Master's or PhD in Statistics, Economics, Computer Science, or related quantitative field
projects_required: Track record of data-driven product impact

title: Data Scientist
description: Analyze viewer behavior and optimize content recommendations. Work on experimentation, causal inference, and personalization algorithms. Partner with ML engineers and product teams.
requirements: Python, SQL, Statistics, Machine Learning, A/B Testing, Spark, 3+ years data science experience
education_required: Master's in Statistics, Data Science, or related field
projects_required: Experience with experimentation and product analytics

title: Junior Data Scientist
description: Support data-driven decision making for Uber's marketplace. Build dashboards, conduct analyses, and learn from senior data scientists. Work on real problems affecting millions of riders and drivers.
requirements: Python or R, SQL, Statistics basics, Data visualization, 1-2 years experience or strong internship
education_required: Bachelor's or Master's in Statistics, Math, Economics, or related field
projects_required: Academic projects or data analysis portfolio

title: Staff Data Scientist
description: Lead data science strategy for a major product area. Mentor data scientists, set technical direction, and partner with leadership. Drive high-impact projects affecting millions of hosts and guests.
requirements: Python, R, SQL, Advanced Statistics, Machine Learning, Causal Inference, Leadership, 8+ years data science with 2+ in senior roles
education_required: PhD in Statistics, Economics, or related field preferred
projects_required: Led major data science initiatives with measurable business impact

title: Data Scientist - Growth
description: Drive user growth through data-driven experiments. Analyze user behavior, design experiments, and build growth models. Work at the intersection of data science and product.
requirements: Python, SQL, Statistics, A/B Testing, Growth modeling, Product analytics, 4+ years data science experience
education_required: Master's in Statistics, Economics, or related field

description: Bridge research and product. Develop novel ML algorithms and deploy them to billions of users. Publish papers while building real-world systems.

education_required: PhD in Machine Learning, Computer Science, or equivalent experience
projects_required: Published research and experience deploying models to production

education_required: Bachelor's in Computer Science, Statistics, or related field
projects_required: Experience building data pipelines and analytics infrastructure

description: Build data infrastructure and ETL pipelines. Work with Spark, Airflow, and cloud data warehouses. Enable data scientists and analysts with reliable, scalable data.

education_required: Bachelor's in Computer Science or related field
projects_required: Built large-scale data pipelines processing terabytes of data

description: Build features across the entire stack - from React frontend to Node.js backend to PostgreSQL database. Work on real-time collaboration and performance.

education_required: Master's or PhD in Machine Learning, Computer Science, or related field
